court: IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
judgment_text:
:1:

IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

IN IN IN ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION

OFFICIAL OFFICIAL OFFICIAL ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006

IN IN IN

INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY NO. 37 OF 1956 NO. 37 OF 1956 NO. 37 OF 1956

Re: Roshanlal Shorey.

... Insolvent.

Ex-parte :

Hiralal Issardas Mangiramalani. ... Petitioning Creditor.

....

Mr. Y.C. Parikh, Official Assignee present.

.....

CORAM CORAM CORAM : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J.

th th th DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006.

P.C. P.C. P.C. : : :

.

An order of adjudication was passed on 4th

September

.

After

the order of

adjudication,

the

Insolvent

has

filed Schedule of Assets and

Liabilities.

On the strength of the said Schedule the Official Assignee

has

recovered some assets.

At present a cash balance

of

Rs.

.30 ps.

and Rs.59,691/- is invested in the fixed

deposit

The total amount of Rs.60,698.30 ps.

is lying in

the

hands

of

the

Official

Assignee

as

against

the

Preferential

Liabilities

of Rs.

,000/- and

Unsecured

Liabilities of Rs.4,12,068/-. No further recoveries are

possible.

.

The Official Assignee has sought permission to

declare the Pro-rata Preferential Dividend to the

Preferential Creditors.

:2:

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

report

of

the Official Assignee, there is no reason

why

the

prayer

should not be granted.

Prayer clause (a)

of

the report of the Official Assignee is accordingly

granted.

-----
